thread.title: Brain Cancer Survivor Creates 4th Annual Fall Brain Cancer Fundraiser
thread.title_full: Brain Cancer Survivor Creates 4th Annual Fall Brain Cancer Fundraiser - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Brain Cancer Survivor Creates 4th Annual Fall Brain Cancer Fundraiser
text:
Brain Matters
PORT WASHINGTON, N.Y. , Oct. 13, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- October is New Years for Heidi Gottlieb . It was October 2007 that she was diagnosed with a very rare type of brain cancer. She was told that her chances of survival were slim, but she's still here. Her doctors now have called her a medical marvel. In October 2011 she started her non-profit Brain Matters and walked 250-miles to Mass General Hospital where she had been treated.
October is the month that despite the times during the year that she deals with certain medical downfalls, she knows she's very lucky to be here. Ms. Gottlieb says, "There are not many brain cancer patients that live to talk about itâ€¦who live to raise funds for further research for the cause. We all need to do more! That's why at Brain Matters we work hard to put together these fundraisers and it's terrific the people and companies that donate their time and the amazing experiences we're able to auction on our Charitybuzz auction #BrainMattersBuzz from October 6 th through 9AM on Thursday, October 22 nd ."
Brain Matters auction has 10 amazing donated events this year. You'll be able to get VIP tickets and celebrity backstage tours to hugely popular TV and Broadway shows. There's something for most everyone to contribute to this important cause.
Think your child "oughta be in pictures"? Then you'll want to grab the opportunity for them to meet with Abrams Artists. Abrams is one of the biggest Broadway, film and television talent agents in NY and LA! How about George Balanchine's Nutcracker for Christmas at Lincoln Center with a backstage tour and another special perk included?
Check out the other rare opportunities and forward the link to your friends and family so they can help support the cause too. https://www.charitybuzz.com/support/BrainMatters .
Want to support the cause and make the cure for brain cancer a reality, but would prefer to donate directly to Brain Matters? Just click on the Brain Matters link below and the DONATE button is right there. All donations go to Mass General Hospital and to other hospitals and medical centers conducting medical research in the area of brain and skull base tumors.
You can learn more about Brain Matters and brain cancer at www.brain-matters.org .
Heidi Gottlieb
Brain Matters
Port Washington, NY 11050
917-553-7995
